channel.title: laptop with Qubes-Whonix does not shut down properly
channel.description:
I only have Qubes-Whonix installed on my laptop. no other operating systems. When I shut down the laptop it appears to shut down but when I go to reboot nothing happens. I have to hold down the power button for like 15 seconds, then press it once more to boot. Any ideas?
Thanks everyone in advance. I'm really grateful for this forum.

item.title: laptop with Qubes-Whonix does not shut down properly
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: laptop with Qubes-Whonix does not shut down properly

item.title: laptop with Qubes-Whonix does not shut down properly
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Since this is a Qubes dom0 issue unrelated to Qubes-Whonix, this here is the wrong forum and belongs to Qubes support. See also:

What to post in this Qubes-Whonix forum and what not. Qubes-Whonix
As a rule of thumb: Everything that happens “inside” the virtual machines is Qubes-Whonix and belongs into this sub forum. Everything that happens “outside” the virtual machine is Qubes and the Qubes help should be consulted. Some examples: EFI → Qubes support Errors by by Qubes VM Manager (QVMM) → Qubes support libvirtError → Qubes support Issues that also apply to Debian based VMs. → Qubes support error: Failed to save domain whonix-ws-dvm to /var/lib/qubes/appvms/whonix-ws-dvm/dvm-…

Read full topic
item.source: laptop with Qubes-Whonix does not shut down properly
